document_data.name: Qaland Shurijah
document_data.mainbody: '''Qaland Shurijah''' was the founder and first ''qaghan'' of the [[Igidujin]] tribe in the [[Plain of Horses]] region.
document_data.History: The pitiless Shurijah united the ''hsing'' (clans) of the [[Chigidi Mountains]], after almost a century of deadly warring with one another and forged the Igidujin tribe. The cruel and despotic [[Qaland]] family reigned over the Igidujin ever since.
document_data.Relations: Shurijah's descendant, [[Qaland T'akk]], reigned over the Igidujin and the city of [[Quaraqand]] ''circa'' {{YearlinkConvert|2607|SY}}.
